summary: Successfully completed comprehensive testing of Jam Sholat Digital KHGT app with 3 TV display layouts. All layouts properly show Ramadan 1447 H (correct Hijri calendar), include Imsak times during Ramadan, and display Islamic events countdown.
passed_tests: Modern layout (/) loads with correct Ramadan 1447 H date display
Classic layout (/classic) shows fullscreen mosque background with Imsak time
Layout2 (/layout2) displays sidebar layout with Islamic quotes and countdown
All layouts correctly show 2-3 Ramadan 1447 H instead of Sya'ban
Imsak prayer time included in all layouts during Ramadan period
Islamic event badges showing 'Nuzulul Quran -16 Hari' countdown
Prayer time highlighting and countdown functionality working
KHGT 1447 H calendar accuracy verified - shows Feb 18, 2026 = 1 Ramadan 1447 H
Responsive design and proper Arabic text display
Running text marquee working on all layouts
Content slideshow and mosque identity display working
